name: sns
summary: Toolkit for simulating decentralizing a dapp via SNS.

create.about: Command line options for creating an SNS configuration.

validate.about: Command line options for validating an SNS configuration.

import.about: Subcommand for importing sns API definitions and canister IDs.

network_mapping.about:
Networks to import canisters ids for.
  --network-mapping <network name in both places>
  --network-mapping <network name here>=<network name in project being imported>
Examples:
  --network-mapping ic
  --network-mapping ic=mainnet

ic_commit.about: IC commit of SNS canister WASMs to download

wasms_dir.about: Path to store downloaded SNS canister WASMs
